channel.title: Comments on: ‘Tis The Season to Marathon
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Kiana Danielle
item.dc:creator: Kiana Danielle
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://lunastationquarterly.com/tis-the-season-to-marathon/#comment-310">tex</a>.
Yikes, compared to that I had it easy. I just took one exam and I had my spot. Thanks for your comment! Are you enjoying the series so far?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to tex.

Yikes, compared to that I had it easy. I just took one exam and I had my spot. Thanks for your comment! Are you enjoying the series so far?

item.title: By: tex
item.dc:creator: tex
item.description: about the process feeling like academic testing, that feels especially true for brazilians, because the way we enter university is by doing one test (once a year) where we compete with thousands and thousands of people for one spot. the image of the people lining up before the building to being tested felt sooooo familiar, similar to my experiences with this once a year test.
item.content:encoded: about the process feeling like academic testing, that feels especially true for brazilians, because the way we enter university is by doing one test (once a year) where we compete with thousands and thousands of people for one spot. the image of the people lining up before the building to being tested felt sooooo familiar, similar to my experiences with this once a year test.
